languages.text: {n}Искоса взглянув на Джай, Паскаль недовольно хрипит:{/n} "Выдвигаю предположение, что торговали они образцами ксенотехнологий. Которые повели себя так, как и должны в руках несведущих — начали нести погибель и вымирание Человечеству".

{n}Giving Jae a sidelong glance, Pasqal wheezes in displeasure,{/n} "I am putting forward a supposition that they traded in samples of xenotechnology. And those samples behaved as expected in the hands of the ignorant — they brought death and extinction to Humankind."
languages.original_text: {n}Искоса взглянув на Джай, Паскаль недовольно хрипит:{/n} "Выдвигаю предположение, что торговали они образцами ксенотехнологий. Которые повели себя так, как и должны в руках несведущих — начали нести погибель и вымирание Человечеству".

traits.locale_text: {n}Giving Jae a sidelong glance, Pasqal wheezes in displeasure,{/n} "I am putting forward a supposition that they traded in samples of xenotechnology. And those samples behaved as expected in the hands of the ignorant — they brought death and extinction to humankind."

{n}Giving Jae a sidelong glance, Pasqal wheezes in displeasure,{/n} "I am putting forward a supposition that they traded in samples of xenotechnology. And those samples behaved as expected in the hands of the ignorant — they brought death and extinction to humankind."

{n}Giving Jae a sidelong glance, Pasqal wheezes in displeasure,{/n} "I am putting forward a supposition that they traded in samples of xenotechnology. And those samples behaved as expected in the hands of the ignorant — they brought death and extinction to humankind."

{n}Giving Jae a sidelong glance, Pasqal wheezes in displeasure,{/n} "I am putting forward a supposition that they traded in samples of xenotechnology. And those samples behaved as expected in the hands of the ignorant — they brought death and extinction to humankind."

{n}Giving Jae a sidelong glance, Pasqal wheezes in displeasure,{/n} "I am putting forward a supposition that they traded in samples of xenotechnology. And those samples behaved as expected in the hands of the ignorant — they brought death and extinction to Humankind."

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡斜眼看了看婕伊，不满地喘了口气。{/n}“我要提出我的假设。那些人交易的东西，是异形科技的样本。这些样本在无知之人的手中，带来了必将带来的结果，它们给人类带来了死亡与毁灭。”
languages.original_text: {n}Giving Jae a sidelong glance, Pasqal wheezes in displeasure,{/n} "I am putting forward a supposition that they traded in samples of xenotechnology. And those samples behaved as expected in the hands of the ignorant — they brought death and extinction to Humankind."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡斜眼看了看婕伊，不满地喘了口气。{/n}“我要提出我的假设。那些人交易的东西，是异形科技的样本。这些样本在无知之人的手中，带来了必将带来的结果，它们给人类带来了死亡与毁灭。”

languages.text: {n}Mirando de reojo a Jae, Pasqal jadea, insatisfecho.{/n} «Según mi actual teoría, traficaron con muestras de xenotecnología. Y dichas muestras hicieron lo que siempre hacen en manos de los ignorantes: traer la muerte y la extinción de la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: {n}Giving Jae a sidelong glance, Pasqal wheezes in displeasure,{/n} "I am putting forward a supposition that they traded in samples of xenotechnology. And those samples behaved as expected in the hands of the ignorant — they brought death and extinction to Humankind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mirando de reojo a Jae, Pasqal jadea, insatisfecho.{/n} «Según mi actual teoría, traficaron con muestras de xenotecnología. Y dichas muestras hicieron lo que siempre hacen en manos de los ignorantes: traer la muerte y la extinción de la Humanidad».

languages.text: {n}ジェイを横目で見ながら、パスカルは不満そうに掠れた声で話す。{/n}「彼らは異星技術のサンプルを取引したのではないかと、自分は仮説する。そしてそれが知識のない者に渡り、案の定の働きをして、死に至らしめ、人間の姿は消えた」
languages.original_text: {n}Giving Jae a sidelong glance, Pasqal wheezes in displeasure,{/n} "I am putting forward a supposition that they traded in samples of xenotechnology. And those samples behaved as expected in the hands of the ignorant — they brought death and extinction to Humankind."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイを横目で見ながら、パスカルは不満そうに掠れた声で話す。{/n}「彼らは異星技術のサンプルを取引したのではないかと、自分は仮説する。そしてそれが知識のない者に渡り、案の定の働きをして、死に至らしめ、人間の姿は消えた」

languages.text: {n}Nach einem Seitenblick auf Jae keucht Pasqal angewidert:{/n} "Ich äußere hiermit die Vermutung, dass sie mit Proben von Xenotech gehandelt haben. Und diese Proben haben sich in den Händen der Unwissenden genauso verhalten wie erwartet – sie haben der Menschheit Tod und Ausrottung gebracht."
languages.original_text: {n}Giving Jae a sidelong glance, Pasqal wheezes in displeasure,{/n} "I am putting forward a supposition that they traded in samples of xenotechnology. And those samples behaved as expected in the hands of the ignorant — they brought death and extinction to Humankind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einem Seitenblick auf Jae keucht Pasqal angewidert:{/n} "Ich äußere hiermit die Vermutung, dass sie mit Proben von Xenotech gehandelt haben. Und diese Proben haben sich in den Händen der Unwissenden genauso verhalten wie erwartet – sie haben der Menschheit Tod und Ausrottung gebracht."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal lance un regard en coin à Jae avec un sifflement de mécontentement :{/n} « J'ai pour théorie qu'ils ont fait commerce d'échantillons de xénotechnologies. Et que ces échantillons se sont comportés comme attendu entre les mains d'ignorants : ils ont apporté la mort et la destruction pour l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: {n}Giving Jae a sidelong glance, Pasqal wheezes in displeasure,{/n} "I am putting forward a supposition that they traded in samples of xenotechnology. And those samples behaved as expected in the hands of the ignorant — they brought death and extinction to Humankind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal lance un regard en coin à Jae avec un sifflement de mécontentement :{/n} « J'ai pour théorie qu'ils ont fait commerce d'échantillons de xénotechnologies. Et que ces échantillons se sont comportés comme attendu entre les mains d'ignorants : ils ont apporté la mort et la destruction pour l'humanité. »

languages.text: {n}Jae'a yan yan bakan Pasqal, hoşnutsuzlukla hırıldıyor.{/n} "Zeno teknolojisi takas ettikleri varsayımını öne süreceğim. Her ne idiyse cahillerin eline geçince beklenen olmuş. İnsanlığa zararı dokunan, sonunu getiren de bunlardır."
languages.original_text: {n}Giving Jae a sidelong glance, Pasqal wheezes in displeasure,{/n} "I am putting forward a supposition that they traded in samples of xenotechnology. And those samples behaved as expected in the hands of the ignorant — they brought death and extinction to Humankind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'a yan yan bakan Pasqal, hoşnutsuzlukla hırıldıyor.{/n} "Zeno teknolojisi takas ettikleri varsayımını öne süreceğim. Her ne idiyse cahillerin eline geçince beklenen olmuş. İnsanlığı mahveden şeylerdir bunlar."
